The [[Version Control]] system allows multiple developers to work simultaneously on a single [[Data File]].
By default, [[Version Control]] features are disabled within the [[Creation Kit]].

The following [[Initialization File]] settings will need to be configured to use ''Version Control''.

====== CreationKitCustom.ini ======
Add or change the following under the <code>[General]</code> section heading of [[CreationKitCustom.ini]].
Replace <code>COMPUTERNAME</code> with your Windows ''Computer Name''.
Note the space in <code>sNetwork Path</code> and do not omit the leading or trailing path seperators.

<source lang="ini">
[General]
bUseVersionControl=1
sNetwork Path=\\COMPUTERNAME\Merging\
sNewVersionBackupPath=\\COMPUTERNAME\Merging\VersionBackup\
sNetworkMasterPath=\\COMPUTERNAME\Merging\Data\
sLocalBackupPath=Data\CheckInBackup\
</source>
* [[CreationKit.ini#bUseVersionControl|General::bUseVersionControl]]
* [[CreationKit.ini#sNetwork_Path|General::sNetwork Path]]
* [[CreationKit.ini#sNewVersionBackupPath|General::sNewVersionBackupPath]]
* [[CreationKit.ini#sNetworkMasterPath|General::sNetworkMasterPath]]
* [[CreationKit.ini#sLocalBackupPath|General::sLocalBackupPath]]

====== CreationKitPrefs.ini ======
Add or change the following under the <code>[WhoCanMerge]</code> section heading of [[CreationKitPrefs.ini]].
Replace <code>USERNAME</code> with your Windows ''User Name''.

<source lang="ini">
[WhoCanMerge]
USERNAME=1
</source>
* [[CreationKitPrefs.ini#USERNAME|WhoCanMerge::USERNAME]]
